sub_title: Experienced Customer-Facing Professional | Account Manager | Customer Success | Customer Support
summary:
With a strong background in customer-facing roles spanning 10 years, I am a dedicated professional experienced in account management, sales, and customer service. Throughout my career, I have successfully managed key client relationships, resolving challenging customer issues, and ensuring customer satisfaction. A quick learner with excellent communication and time management skills, I thrive in dynamic and fast-paced settings. 

      Currently seeking new opportunities in customer support, customer success, or account management roles where I can leverage my expertise to drive customer satisfaction and contribute to business growth. Let's connect and explore how my skills can benefit your organization.

- Delivered exceptional results, closing the third-largest deal in Q1 of the sales team and exceeding monthly targets by over 200% in Q1 2022.', 'title': ' Account Executive', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 2751, 'name': 'Expedia Group', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQGCJ4PG0WVumA/company-logo_400_400/0/1593618041184?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=161Q6oYXV9tXBD8KhUCPHWAc2wOPS5AjJBkJpSv6ZUU', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/expedia/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Istanbul, Turkey', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'Expedia Group', 'description': "Account Management:

- Provided customer support for 4,000+ hotel partners, resolving issues and collecting payments via email and phone.

- Daily phone contact with the top producer hotels in my region in order to discover their needs and provide solutions by upselling and pitching products and services of Expedia.

- Negotiation and securing seasonal deals and promotions within the guidelines set by the management, to support the brandsâ€™ merchandising and marketing efforts.

- Ensuring that partner hotelsâ€™ products (content, rates, and availability) are consistently optimized on the Expedia Group sites to maximize customer conversion. 

- Providing consultancy reports and market insight data to the hotel partners in order to establish revenue strategies together. 

Sales and Business Development:

- Lead generation by using Emails, Salesforce, Google Search, and Social Media. 

- Daily calls (cold calls) and face-to-face meetings with potential business partners to pitch Expedia Group as an OTA partner and convince them to sign the contract. 

- Help and facilitate new partners' onboarding process.", 'title': 'Account Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Istanbul, Turkey', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'Expedia Group', 'description': '- Negotiating with partners to capture competitive rates and availability for Expedia Customers.

- Handling business related Salesforce cases such as the termination of contract, removal of promotions, and rejection of reservations.  

- Optimizing client ad campaigns through improving quality scores, suggesting optimum pricing/targeting, and providing performance analyses to boost client ROI', 'title': 'Account Executive', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 1788623, 'name': 'Marveltour Tourism, Inc.', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQG6pgEnNJZWFg/company-logo_400_400/0/1519916950084?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=rLaL3H-ULqZoG1EMEdArYlL0pvYtrDS0-rOtKtNyw5k', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/marveltour-tourism-inc./', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Istanbul, Turkey', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'Marveltour Tourism, Inc.', 'description': '- Served as a customer support representative, assisting customers with inquiries and resolving any issues or concerns promptly and effectively.
